<user_input>

<goal>show the data from `simpleValue2`</goal>

<description>Show the data from the `simpleValue2` charm, displaying its current value and any associated metadata.</description>

</user_input>

<existing_schema>
```json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "simplevalue2": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "values": {
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "type": "string"
          }
        }
      },
      "additionalProperties": false
    }
  }
}
```
</existing_schema>

Based on this goal and the existing schema, please provide a title, description, any additional schema, detailed specification, and implementation plan.

<thinking>
The user wants to display data from a `simpleValue2` charm. Looking at the existing schema, I can see that `simpleValue2` is an object with a property called `values`, which is an array of strings.

The goal is simple: create a viewer to display this data. I need to create a minimal solution that works with the existing schema without modifying it.

The artifact should be a viewer component that displays:
1. The current values in the array
2. Any relevant metadata (though the schema doesn't show any specific metadata fields)

Since this is a simple display component, I'll keep the implementation plan straightforward.
</thinking>

<title>
SimpleValue2 Viewer
</title>

<description>
A viewer component to display data from the simpleValue2 charm.
</description>

<spec>
The SimpleValue2 Viewer will display all string values stored in the simpleValue2.values array. It will render each value as a list item, showing the array index and the string content. If the values array is empty, it will display a message indicating no data is available.
</spec>

<plan>
1. Retrieve the simpleValue2 object from the existing schema
2. Extract and iterate through the values array
3. Render each value in a formatted list with appropriate styling
</plan>

<result_schema>
{
  "type": "object",
  "title": "SimpleValue2 Viewer",
  "description": "Display component for simpleValue2 data",
  "properties": {
    "displayData": {
      "type": "object",
      "title": "Display Data",
      "description": "Formatted data for display",
      "properties": {
        "values": {
          "type": "array",
          "title": "Values",
          "description": "List of string values from simpleValue2",
          "default": [],
          "items": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "index": {
                "type": "integer",
                "title": "Index",
                "description": "Position in the array"
              },
              "value": {
                "type": "string",
                "title": "Value",
                "description": "String value from the array"
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "isEmpty": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "title": "Is Empty",
          "description": "Whether the values array is empty",
          "default": true
        }
      },
      "required": ["values", "isEmpty"]
    }
  },
  "required": ["displayData"]
}
</result_schema>
